ygData.subject: Quick Story
ygData.msgSnippet: So I have been seeing the posts about how Selo s beats out SoW any day of the week.  I had never had the chance to test this until I was helping a druid friend
ygData.messageBody:
So I have been seeing the posts about how Selo's beats out SoW any day of
the week. I had never had the chance to test this until I was helping a
druid friend get their body from LavaStorm. I asked if they wanted to group
and use my song or if they just wanted to use SoW as we ran through the
forest. Well she tried to keep up with me using SoW and couldn't so I
grouped her and used Selo. I am only 14th Level with a standard drum. Just
thought I would share :)

-Jontom 14th Bard - Veeshan
